headline: IDEX Corporation Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., June 18, 2025--IDEX CORPORATION (NYSE:IEX) today announced that its Board of Directors has approved a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.71 per common share. This dividend will be paid July 25, 2025 to shareholders of record as of July 11, 2025. This dividend represents the company’s 123rd consecutive regular quarterly cash dividend payment.
